chinese: 絆倒危險（如鬆動的地毯、電線）
可能含鉛油漆（1978年前的表面）
缺失或失效的煙霧探測器

english: Excessive indoor heat with poor ventilation
Unfenced pools, spas, or standing water hazards
chinese: 未圍欄的游泳池、水療池或積水危險

english: Cracks, sagging ceilings, or structural damage
chinese: 裂縫、天花板下垂或結構損壞

english: Windows above ground floor without guards/stops
chinese: 地面以上窗戶無防護欄或限位器
清潔用品或化學品可被兒童接觸到

english: No radon testing in high-risk areas
chinese: 高風險地區未進行氡氣檢測

english: Blocked exits or inadequate escape routes
chinese: 出口堵塞或逃生路線不足
室內空氣污染源（吸煙、化學品）

english: Excessive pet allergens with sensitive residents
chinese: 有過敏體質者接觸過多寵物過敏原

english: Lack of grab bars, non-slip surfaces
